entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
